Orange Shore07249t9wmke2vamm0njtrpueerdq9fcev45g1784762015-03-22T03:02:13ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[Image:Orange Shore.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of the Orange Shore on the continent of Essos.]]
The '''Orange Shore''' is a region of the continent of [[Essos]]. It is located to the west of [[Volantis]], forming the south coast of the continent between the [[Rhoyne]] delta and the [[Disputed Lands]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/lys/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Lys entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'', the Orange Shore is located in the same area.
